level.text: The Criminal Justice Coordinating Council shall include the following members:
Mayor, District of Columbia (Chair);
Chairman, Council of the District of Columbia;
Chairperson, Judiciary Committee, Council of the District of Columbia;
Chief Judge, Superior Court of the District of Columbia;
Chief, Metropolitan Police Department;
Director, District of Columbia Department of Corrections;
Corporation Counsel for the District of Columbia;
Director, Department of Human Services' Youth Services Administration;
Director, Public Defender Service;
Director, Pretrial Services Agency;
Director, Court Services and Offender Supervision Agency;
United States Attorney for the District of Columbia;
District of Columbia Corrections Trustee;
Director, Federal Bureau of Prisons;
Chair, United States Parole Commission;
Chair, District of Columbia Financial Responsibility and Management Assistance Authority ("Authority"); and
Board Member for Public Safety, Authority.
Membership of the Authority members shall expire upon the dissolution of the Authority.
